review: Great product! Loved it!! No need to have an iPad or an iPhone app to use it!
author: AViquez

review: Love this Fire TV Stick. So far we err very happy with it.
author: Sandra Cunningham "4jmj"

review: Most comfortable device to use. Especially with FireTV app on my iPhone is a PLUS! Closed caption is SUPERIOR! I always feel good to turn it on and begin to watch from any channel apps.
author: TrailWolf131

review: Fell far below my already low expectations. awkward connection to my mounted television, led me to return it.
author: Aquita Evans

review: Works great. Easy to operate. Just wish I could use it while I'm in Canada.
author: Cindy Brown

review: Once I got it connected it's great. Love my prime access.Started watching a series that I missed.  It's wonderful
author: beverly Hunter
